attributes.action: create more police patrols after 9pm in major towns and cities to curb street violence and crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Street violence and crime has been a by-product of two things. Firstly, drinking and secondly the fact that only a very few policeman (sometimes 8 in a city like Newcastle) are patrolling the city after 9pm. We, all those below, would like to see more police officers patrolling our streets after 9pm all the way up to 5am.
